projects.title: React Admin Dashboard
projects.content: This is a admin pannel made in React.Js and Tailwind CSS
projects.description: This is my personal portfolio website. Inpired by minimalistic theme. All the beautiful animations are Lottie Animation. And the beautiful transitions are done with Framer Motion

projects.title: React Admin Dashboard
projects.content: This is a admin pannel made in React.Js and Tailwind CSS
projects.description: This is a admin pannel made in React.js and Tailwind CSS. The charts used are from Apex Charts. So its an experimental project. The icons Are from Lucid-Ui. Routing is done using React-Router-Dom v6

projects.title: Samurai Style Portfolio
projects.description: This is my personal portfolio website. Inpired by samurai theme. All the 3d models are implemented with the help of React-Three-Fiber. And for styling Tailwind CSS is used.
